Self.Wiki: Determines appearance of loading screens and the tips they show.

disableParam_NT.Wiki: Exclude from the NT version or mark the ones to be excluded.

unlockFlagId.Wiki: The event flag ID that causes this loading screen to appear. -1 means it will always appear. Removal flag will override this.

invalidFlagId.Wiki: The event flag ID that causes this loading screen to disappear. -1 means it will never appear.

msgId.Wiki: The FMG ID to use for the displayed hint text (both title and description. -1 means none.
